# GitHub Labels Configuration

These labels should be created in your GitHub repository for issue and PR management.

Go to: https://github.com/jwhankins177/better_practice_better/labels

## Priority Labels
- **high priority** - ğŸ”´ Red (#d73a4a) - Needs immediate attention
- **medium priority** - ğŸŸ¡ Yellow (#fbca04) - Important but not urgent
- **low priority** - ğŸŸ¢ Green (#0e8a16) - Nice to have

## Type Labels
- **bug** - ğŸ› Red (#d73a4a) - Something isn't working
- **enhancement** - âœ¨ Blue (#0075ca) - New feature or request
- **improvement** - ğŸ“ˆ Purple (#a2eeef) - Enhancement to existing feature
- **documentation** - ğŸ“š Light Blue (#0075ca) - Documentation updates

## Status Labels
- **in progress** - ğŸš§ Orange (#d93f0b) - Currently being worked on
- **needs review** - ğŸ‘€ Pink (#e99695) - Ready for review
- **blocked** - ğŸš« Dark Red (#b60205) - Blocked by dependencies

## Scope Labels
- **frontend** - ğŸ¨ Blue (#1d76db) - UI/UX changes
- **backend** - âš™ï¸ Grey (#5319e7) - API/data changes
- **analytics** - ğŸ“Š Purple (#5319e7) - Analytics features
- **mobile** - ğŸ“± Teal (#008672) - Mobile-specific issues
